answers.answer: If it's in both legs, that tends to rule out deep vein thrombosis I think, but what about phlebitis?  You don't have diabetes, do you?  Sorry I can't be more helpful; you might look those two up just to rule out symptoms.

question: Hello,My question is this. I have been experiencing swelling in my lower leg it started in the right leg but it is now in the left. From my toes to lower shin my leg has hot spots  and swelling. I do experience pain when shoes and or socks are removed. Can you please tell me what I could do to resolve this until I can see a doctor. I do not have health insurance so I would need to save money to pay for the visit. Thank you in advance.
title: Swollen Leg
